attributes.action: Televise Kell Brook vs Terence Crawford Boxing fight on the 14th November 2020
attributes.additional_details: Kell Brook is from Sheffield, England, and he is fighting the American Terence Crawford for the WBO title in America. Terence Crawford is considered to be the best boxer in the world in that weight class.
attributes.background: I would like the government to televise the Kell Brooks title fight against Terence Crawford  because he is from Sheffield, England and he has the chance to beat the fighter in America.
